document.discussion_title: West Ham 1-0 Bournemouth: Slaven Bilic says his side wanted it more
document.topic_text: West Ham manager Slaven Bilic says his team wanted to win more than Bournemouth in their 1-0 victory in the first Premier League game at their new London Stadium home. »
document.post: West Ham manager Slaven Bilic says his team wanted to win more than Bournemouth in their 1-0 victory in the first Premier League game at their new London Stadium home. »
